data.title: South China Morning Post
data.meta_description: Ishani Sarkar is an India-based journalist, writer and editor specialising in entertainment and pop culture. She has worked extensively in the Asian entertainment industry, interviewing top talents like Ju Ji-hoon and Song Kang. Born and raised in India, Ishani has an MA in English Literature and is fluent in Korean.
data.text:
The Flight Attendant actress previously swore off marriage but has been persuaded to walk down the aisle a third time with Ozark actor Tom Pelphrey – so what do we know about him?

Haden met Black in school, but they didn’t date until years later and now share 2 sons; she’s also a talented musician who performs with her sisters, and a visual artist who regularly exhibits her works

They embarked on what was supposed to be an 8-day Crew Flight Test mission to the International Space Station in June aboard a Boeing Starliner spacecraft, but now they may not return to Earth until next year

Fans are highly anticipating Gladiator II, the sequel to Scott’s 2000 original film – but his wife is in showbiz too, as both an actress in the 1980s and as a producer

Zendaya and Appling first met on the set of Disney’s K.C. Undercover – now, she describes him as her ‘brother, mother, grandmother, chaperon, guidance counsellor’

Mulaney was married to multidisciplinary artist Tendler for 8 years before divorcing her and tying the knot with Olivia Munn, with whom he shares a son

Harington just attended the season 3 premiere for Industry, where he gushed about his 3-year-old son and baby daughter, who just turned one – so what do we know about his wife?

The pop icon and her billionaire ex-husband Wissam Al Mana co-parent their seven-year-old son Eissa today, but the couple split just months after she gave birth

Her father fuelled rumours about his marriage in a random TikTok interview this year, but she’s previously spoken about navigating speculation, being a ‘nepo baby’ and charting her own course

She’s been in a Drake music video, had a role in Zack Snyder’s Justice League and was a Sports Illustrated Rookie of the Year for 2024

Boys Don’t Cry star Hilary Swank really does seem to have met her twin flame in Philip Schneider, who she married in a forest of giant red woods in 2018 – here’s what you need to know about him

Nicki Minaj’s 18-year-old half-sister Ming Li wants to make her own name for herself … so what do we know about the rookie rapper?

Is Sklenar the next ‘internet’s boyfriend’? He’s playing Atlas in the film adaptation of Colleen Hoover’s hit romance novel, but he used to work in construction and live in his car …

Meet Adin Ross, a Gen Z streamer who just had the former US president Donald Trump on his channel on Kick … what else do we know about the 23-year-old who’s known for his controversial interviews?

Eve Jobs and Harry Charles have more in common than you think: they’re both equestrians and they both have famous fathers … here’s what you need to know about the Olympian

Zach Wilson has said it’s ‘not [his] favourite’ thing when pundits and online commenters focus on his young-looking mum at his NFL games – here’s what you need to know about Lisa Wilson

On this luxe boating trip, the actor was spotted giving the tennis star a shoulder massage, and while they aren’t confirmed to be an item, they sure look comfortable together

The budding actress recently shared a snarky dig at her mum’s ex, Kenneth Branagh, whose marriage to Emma Thompson ended in 1995 after his affair with The Crown star Helena Bonham Carter

The Chicago Sky forward and Detroit Pistons centre sent fans into detective mode after sharing Instagram Stories that made it look like they may be on a romantic getaway together

Hollywood actress Reese Witherspoon may have a new man in her life – so what do we know about German financier Oliver Haarmann?

Hollywood star Saoirse Ronan just tied the knot with her boyfriend Jack Lowden in a private ceremony in Edinburgh … so what else do we know about the Scottish actor on the rise?

His first meeting with the Desperate Housewives left little impression … but then they went on a four-hour long date, got married and now they have a son, Santiago Enrique Bastón

The designer had an idyllic childhood with her sister and was an attendant at last year’s coronation; she worked on King Charles’ Duchy of Cornwall before being removed from the payroll by Prince William

Off-camera, Serhant is a devoted family man unafraid of hard work – he’s wrote three books, built a bestselling online course, hosted a podcast, and is focused on philanthropy too

The Sports Illustrated model Brooklyn Decker – who’s also an entrepreneur, angel investor and mother of two – has just been forced to reveal her political affiliations after an erroneous tweet …

She’s opened for Shania Twain, Haim and her brother’s ex Phoebe Bridgers, and accompanied the Normal People star to the Baftas – but why did she drop out of school?
